price: 154. Moominiiney Yallih gital Angacalluk Qiddiimeh yan marak usun Rabe mara maxcina, wonna hinnay usun sinni Rabbih xaqul Nuwwoonuh isin Aaxige waytaanä kalah.
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولُواْ لِمَن يُقۡتَلُ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمۡوَٰتُۢۚ بَلۡ أَحۡيَآءٞ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlū liman yuq'talu fī sabīli al-lahi amwātun bal aḥyāon walākin lā tashʿurūna
